DS.FilteredRecordArray Class

Extends DS.RecordArray
Defined in: packages/ember-data/lib/system/record_arrays/filtered_record_array.js:9
Module: ember-data

Represents a list of records whose membership is determined by the store. As records are created, loaded, or modified, the store evaluates them to determine if they should be part of the record array.

  • Index
  • Methods
  • Properties

Adds a record to the RecordArray without duplicates

    optional index to insert at

filterFunction

(
  • record
)
Boolean

Defined in packages/ember-data/lib/system/record_arrays/filtered_record_array.js:20

The filterFunction is a function used to test records from the store to determine if they should be part of the record array.

Example

var allPeople = store.all('person');
allPeople.mapBy('name'); // ["Tom Dale", "Yehuda Katz", "Trek Glowacki"]

var people = store.filter('person', function(person) {
  if (person.get('name').match(/Katz$/)) { return true; }
});
people.mapBy('name'); // ["Yehuda Katz"]

var notKatzFilter = function(person) {
  return !person.get('name').match(/Katz$/);
};
people.set('filterFunction', notKatzFilter);
people.mapBy('name'); // ["Tom Dale", "Trek Glowacki"]

Parameters:

  • record DS.Model

Returns:

Boolean:

true if the record should be in the array

save

() DS.PromiseArray

Inherited from DS.RecordArray: packages/ember-data/lib/system/record_arrays/record_array.js:162

Saves all of the records in the RecordArray.

Example

var messages = store.all('message');
messages.forEach(function(message) {
  message.set('hasBeenSeen', true);
});
messages.save();

Returns:

DS.PromiseArray:

promise

update

()

Inherited from DS.RecordArray: packages/ember-data/lib/system/record_arrays/record_array.js:96

Used to get the latest version of all of the records in this array from the adapter.

Example

var people = store.all('person');
people.get('isUpdating'); // false
people.update();
people.get('isUpdating'); // true

updateFilter

() private

Defined in packages/ember-data/lib/system/record_arrays/filtered_record_array.js:54

Properties

content

Ember.Array private

Inherited from DS.RecordArray: packages/ember-data/lib/system/record_arrays/record_array.js:30

The array of client ids backing the record array. When a record is requested from the record array, the record for the client id at the same index is materialized, if necessary, by the store.

isLoaded

Boolean

Inherited from DS.RecordArray: packages/ember-data/lib/system/record_arrays/record_array.js:42

The flag to signal a RecordArray is currently loading data.

Example

var people = store.all('person');
people.get('isLoaded'); // true

isUpdating

Boolean

Inherited from DS.RecordArray: packages/ember-data/lib/system/record_arrays/record_array.js:56

The flag to signal a RecordArray is currently loading data.

Example

var people = store.all('person');
people.get('isUpdating'); // false
people.update();
people.get('isUpdating'); // true

store

DS.Store private

Inherited from DS.RecordArray: packages/ember-data/lib/system/record_arrays/record_array.js:73

The store that created this record array.

type

DS.Model

Inherited from DS.RecordArray: packages/ember-data/lib/system/record_arrays/record_array.js:22
